templates.name: Tech Startup Introduction
templates.description: Initial outreach to technology startup executives

fields.conversation_thread: Hi {{first_name}}, I noticed your recent post about {{topic}}. As someone working in {{industry}}, I found your perspective on {{specific_point}} particularly insightful.
fields.message_context: Introducing our {{solution_type}} platform that helps fast-growing tech companies {{value_proposition}}. We've helped similar companies achieve {{key_metric}}.

templates.name: Sales Leader Follow-up
templates.description: Follow-up message for sales leaders after initial connection

fields.conversation_thread: Thanks for connecting, {{first_name}}! I see you're leading sales at {{company}}. Given your focus on {{sales_focus}}, I thought you might find this relevant.
fields.message_context: Helping sales leaders accelerate pipeline velocity and improve win rates through {{approach}}. Particularly relevant for teams dealing with {{challenge}}.

templates.name: Enterprise Decision Maker
templates.description: Outreach to C-level or VP-level executives at large companies

fields.message_context: Enterprise-focused approach emphasizing ROI, security, and scalability. Reference implementation with {{similar_company}} resulted in {{specific_result}}.

templates.name: FinTech Innovation Partner
templates.description: Reaching out to fintech companies about innovation partnerships

fields.conversation_thread: Hi {{first_name}}, Impressive work on {{achievement}}. In the current {{market_condition}} environment, how is {{company}} approaching {{challenge_area}}?
fields.message_context: Partnering with innovative fintech companies to navigate {{regulatory_area}} while accelerating {{business_metric}}. Focus on {{specific_solution}}.

templates.name: Healthcare Digital Transformation
templates.description: Outreach to healthcare organizations about digital initiatives

fields.message_context: HIPAA-compliant solutions for healthcare digital transformation. Focus on {{care_area}} with demonstrated {{outcome_metric}} improvement.

fields.conversation_thread: Hi {{first_name}}, {{mutual_connection}} suggested I reach out to you. They mentioned you're {{current_focus}} at {{company}}.
fields.message_context: Following up on {{mutual_connection}}'s introduction. They thought our work in {{area_of_expertise}} might be relevant to your {{specific_initiative}}.

templates.name: Event Follow-up
templates.description: Following up after meeting at an event or webinar

fields.conversation_thread: Hi {{first_name}}, Great meeting you at {{event_name}}! I really enjoyed our conversation about {{topic_discussed}}.
fields.message_context: Following up from {{event_name}}. As discussed, we help companies like {{company}} achieve {{specific_outcome}} through {{approach}}.

templates.name: Competitive Replacement
templates.description: Reaching out to companies using competitor solutions

fields.message_context: Companies switching from {{competitor}} typically see {{improvement_metric}} improvement in {{timeframe}}. Key advantages include {{advantage_list}}.

templates.name: Expansion Opportunity
templates.description: Reaching out about expansion or growth initiatives

fields.conversation_thread: Hi {{first_name}}, Congratulations on {{recent_milestone}}! With {{company}}'s expansion into {{new_area}}, I imagine {{challenge}} is top of mind.
fields.message_context: Supporting high-growth companies through expansion phases. Our {{solution}} helps address {{specific_challenge}} while maintaining {{important_factor}}.

templates.name: Problem-Solution Fit
templates.description: Direct approach addressing a specific problem

fields.message_context: Direct value proposition focusing on {{problem_area}}. Typical results include {{result_1}}, {{result_2}}, and {{result_3}}.

your_company.description: Common company names for quick selection
